remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 序列化是将对象的公共属性和字段转换为序列格式（这里是指 XML）以便存储或传输的过程。XML serialization is the process of converting an object's public properties and fields to a serial format (in this case, XML) for storage or transport. 反序列化中重新创建对象的 XML 输出从其原始状态。Deserialization re-creates the object in its original state from the XML output. 你可以将序列化视为一种方法将对象的状态保存到流或缓冲区。You can think of serialization as a way of saving the state of an object into a stream or buffer. 例如，ASP.NET 使用类 XML Web 服务消息进行编码。For example, ASP.NET uses the class to encode XML Web service messages. 对象中的数据是用编程语言构造来描述的，如类、字段、属性、基元类型、数组，甚至 或 对象形式的嵌入 XML。The data in your objects is described using programming language constructs like classes, fields, properties, primitive types, arrays, and even embedded XML in the form of or objects. 你可以创建您自己的类，具有属性，或使用批注的选择[XML 架构定义工具 (Xsd.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a6e6e65c-347f-4494-9457-653bf29baac2)生成基于现有 XML 架构定义 (XSD) 文档的类。You have the option of creating your own classes, annotated with attributes, or using the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a6e6e65c-347f-4494-9457-653bf29baac2) to generate the classes based on an existing XML Schema definition (XSD) document. 如果你有一个 XML 架构，你可以运行 Xsd.exe 生成的类，强类型化为架构并使用要遵守序列化时的架构属性批注的一组。If you have an XML Schema, you can run the Xsd.exe to produce a set of classes that are strongly typed to the schema and annotated with attributes to adhere to the schema when serialized. 若要将数据传输对象和 XML 之间需要映射到 XML 架构的编程语言构造从和 XML 架构的编程语言构造。To transfer data between objects and XML requires a mapping from the programming language constructs to XML schema and from the XML schema to the programming language constructs. 和 Xsd.exe 等相关的工具提供这两种技术在同时设计时和运行时之间的桥梁。The and related tools like Xsd.exe provide the bridge between these two technologies at both design time and runtime. 在设计时，使用 Xsd.exe 从自定义类生成 XML 架构文档 (.xsd) 或生成从给定的架构的类。At design time, use the Xsd.exe to produce an XML schema document (.xsd) from your custom classes or to produce classes from a given schema. 在任一情况下，类进行批注使用自定义属性，以指示如何 XML 架构系统和公共语言运行时之间进行映射。In either case, the classes are annotated with custom attributes to instruct the how to map between the XML schema system and the common language runtime. 在运行时，这些类的实例可以序列化为遵循给定的架构的 XML 文档。At runtime, instances of the classes can be serialized into XML documents that follow the given schema. 同样，可以将这些 XML 文档反序列化到运行时对象中。Likewise, these XML documents can be deserialized into runtime objects. 请注意，XML 架构是可选的在设计时或运行时并不是必需的。Note that the XML schema is optional, and not required at design
